akn:content.akn:p: (a) Purpose It is the purpose of this part, to assist in making available the benefits of postsecondary education to eligible students (defined in accordance with section 1091 of this title) in institutions of higher education by—

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Secretary required to carry out purposes

akn:content.akn:p: (b) Secretary required to carry out purposes The Secretary shall, in accordance with subparts 1 through 9 of this part, carry out programs to achieve the purposes of this part.
